Throw it into the air and the rain will stop.
Moreover, if there is an enemy who gives rise to evil intentions,
use vermilion or red earth.
Write their name or form.
Step on it with your left foot and recite.
Do this one hundred and eight times at night.
Regardless of distance, the enemy will come themselves to seek reconciliation.
Their mind will become harmonious and they will turn to love and respect.
Moreover, if you wish to employ all ghosts and spirits,

Consecrate food and drink to the full extent of one hundred and eight times according to your ability.
Scatter it as an offering.
Then drive them to work and they will quickly accomplish it.
They will always give rise to joy and will never leave you.
Moreover, if one wishes to summon all people,
regardless of how far or near they are, according to one's thoughts,
consecrate water seven times,
scatter it in the four directions, and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times facing them.
Regardless of whether they know it or not,

Moreover, if there is an enemy who comes to harm one,
sincerely recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.
They will immediately be struck and their body will be like fire.
If one changes their mind and submits,
then when they are released,
recite the mantra seven times and say let go.
They will be released and their body will immediately return to normal.
Moreover, if there is a married couple,

Follow the previous method and step on them with the left foot.
Recite the name one thousand and eight times.

Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire once, and the illness will be cured.
